channel.title: Help with 508 server
channel.description:
Hi, i need help setting up a 508 server. i followed gods army's tutorial and downloaded it all but idk what to do from there
i have the server, client, and cache, he said click start and in there put C:\ ? ? ? ? ?
can anyone elaborate on that please? starting with were the freak "start" is?[br][br][size=1]Posted on: February 01, 2009, 01:52:54 pm[/size][hr]Please Help i cant do any coding until i get this working :(
